rows.label: bf08350100_0010
rows.name: Boss, why you looking so worried?

rows.label: bf08350100_0020
rows.name: Maybe you dropped your wallet somewhere?

rows.label: bf08350100_0030
rows.name: No, I didn't lose anything.

rows.label: bf08350100_0040
rows.name:
Tora understand!
You worried because wallet is empty?

rows.label: bf08350100_0050
rows.name:
That's right.
I haven't been working lately, so...

rows.label: bf08350100_0060
rows.name:
Hold on,
why are we discussing the contents of my wallet?

rows.label: bf08350100_0070
rows.name:
Then what is it?
You've been gloomy this whole time, boy.

rows.label: bf08350100_0080
rows.name:
Well...
I was thinking about Marveni.

rows.label: bf08350100_0090
rows.name:
If Shin was telling the truth,
then Marveni doesn't just hate Blades...

rows.label: bf08350100_0100
rows.name: He might hate humans as well.

rows.label: bf08350100_0105
rows.name:
I mean, he basically hates
the whole world, seems like.

rows.label: bf08350100_0110
rows.name: Why's that?

rows.label: bf08350100_0120
rows.name:
The ancient kingdom of Iira coexisted with Blades 
who would eventually become Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf08350100_0130
rows.name:
So destroying Iira essentially meant
destroying the Divine Beasts as well.

rows.label: bf08350100_0140
rows.name:
Marveni must have known that Divine Beasts have been 
declining in number for centuries.

rows.label: bf08350100_0150
rows.name:
If Divine Beasts all gone,
Tora and everyone die too!

rows.label: bf08350100_0160
rows.name:
Perhaps the Holy See saw it
as a threat to their authority.

rows.label: bf08350100_0170
rows.name:
If people saw Blades becoming Divine Beasts and 
creating land, they might worship Blades instead.

rows.label: bf08350100_0180
rows.name:
A new religion would pose
a serious threat to the Holy See.

rows.label: bf08350100_0190
rows.name:
That much I can understand.
It's just politics and power struggles.

rows.label: bf08350100_0200
rows.name: But...

rows.label: bf08350100_0210
rows.name: Rex...

rows.label: bf08350100_0220
rows.name:
First you hate others, then yourself,
and finally you hate the entire world.

rows.label: bf08350100_0230
rows.name: And what comes after hating the world?

rows.label: bf08350100_0240
rows.name: You mean...

rows.label: bf08350100_0250
rows.name: Destroy it. That's all that's left.

rows.label: bf08350100_0260
rows.name: That's where this is heading, isn't it?

rows.label: bf08350100_0270
rows.name:
I'd like to say that's a leap in logic,
but in fact there are many such people.

rows.label: bf08350100_0280
rows.name: I said it before, didn't I?

rows.label: bf08350100_0290
rows.name:
That talking to Marveni
felt like talking to Metsu.

rows.label: bf08350100_0300
rows.name: Yeah. You did say that.

rows.label: bf08350100_0310
rows.name:
I'm worried about this...
What if Marveni and Metsu share the same goal...
